snippet.title: Idol Queens of Kpop (Voice actor version)
snippet.description:
The most realistic idol making game

App Store.
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/idol-queens-production/id1571083536

Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=sunbeesoft.queensidol.com


● The most realistic idol making game
Train your idols just like the real k-pop entertainment agencies do!
Be a producer, recruit and train trainees, and manage the agency as a business executive!
Expand your company internationally with your management strategy and produce a star idol!
